summary.span: 表示一种控件，该控件以固定查看模式查看流内容(一次显示一页内容)。

span.span: Represents a control for viewing flow content in a fixed viewing mode that shows content one page at a time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只允许一个为的子元素。 allows only one as a child element. 显示的内容在页每次查看模式下。 shows content in page-at-a-time viewing mode. 相似的控件， ，显示的内容在连续滚动模式。A similar control, , shows content in continuous scrolling mode. 同时和固定为特定的查看模式。Both and are fixed to a particular viewing mode. 另一方面，包括使用户能够动态各种查看模式之间进行选择的功能 (如由枚举)，但代价是性能不如或。On the other hand, includes features that enable the user to dynamically choose between various viewing modes (as provided by the enumeration), at the cost of being poorer performing than or . 下图显示控件及其默认[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。The following illustration shows a control with its default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. ![屏幕快照： FlowDocumentPageViewer](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-main.png "屏幕快照： FlowDocumentPageViewer")![Screenshot: FlowDocumentPageViewer](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-main.png "Screenshot: FlowDocumentPageViewer") - **内容区域**的内容区域中显示的内容指定的属性。**Content Area** - The content area displays the contents of the specified by the property. - **工具栏**-默认工具栏停靠在内容区域的下方和承载页面导航和更改的缩放级别的控件。**Toolbar** - The default toolbar is docked underneath the content area, and hosts controls for navigating pages, and changing the zoom level. - **页面导航控件**-页面导航控件包括一个按钮，用于跳转到下一页 （向下箭头） 或前一页 （向上箭头），以及当前页码和总页数的指示符。**Page Navigation Controls** - The page navigation controls include a button to jump to the next page (the down arrow) or previous page (the up arrow), as well as indicators for the current page number and total number of pages. - **缩放控件**-缩放控件使用户能够增加或减少的缩放级别，通过单击加号或减号按钮，分别。**Zoom Controls** - The zoom controls enable the user to increase or decrease the zoom level by clicking the plus or minus buttons, respectively. 缩放控件还包括一个用于调整缩放级别的滑块。The zoom controls also include a slider for adjusting the zoom level. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . - **搜索**-用户可以使用 Ctr + F 键盘快捷方式，或者你可以使用来切换用于查找字符串内容中的搜索文本框。**Search** - The user can use the Ctr+F keyboard shortcut or you can use to toggle a search textbox that is used to find strings within the content. 有关更多信息，请参见。See for more information. ## Examples 下面的示例定义图中显示在上图中。The following example defines the pictured in the figure above. [!code-xaml[FloaterFigureSnippets#_FlowDocumentPageViewerXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FloaterFigureSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumentpageviewerxaml)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法减少当前级别通过指定的值属性。This method decreases the current level by the value specified by the property. 默认[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]包括一个按钮，以减小缩放比例。Default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a button to decrease the zoom. 调用此方法不起如果属性返回`false`。Calling this method has no effect if the property returns `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Find() cil managed

span.span: Toggles the **Find** dialog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，Ctrl + F 的键盘快捷方式提供用于切换**查找**对话框。By default, Ctrl+F provides a keyboard shortcut for toggling the **Find** dialog. 下图显示**查找**对话框中的，在具有默认 UI。The following figure shows the **Find** dialog on a with default UI. ![屏幕快照: 查找对话框的 FlowDocumentPageViewer](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-find.png "屏幕快照： FlowDocumentPageViewer 的")![Screenshot: Find Dialog of FlowDocumentPageViewer](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-find.png "Screenshot: Find Dialog of FlowDocumentPageViewer") 默认值**查找**对话框包括一个用于输入搜索文本字段以及用于按钮**查找下一个**，**查找上一个**，和**选项**.The default **Find** dialog includes a field for entering search text, as well as buttons for **Find Next**, **Find Previous**, and **Options**. 以下**查找**提供的默认的选项：The following **Find** options are provided by default: - 全字匹配Match whole word only - 区分大小写Match case - 区分音调符号Match diacritic - 匹配 kashidaMatch kashida - 匹配 alef hamzaMatch alef hamza

summary.span: 获取或设置 允许的最大 级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum allowable level for the .

value.span: 的最大允许缩放级别，以百分比表示。

span.span: The maximum allowable zoom level for the , interpreted as a percentage.

value.span: 默认值为 200.0（最大缩放比例为 200%）。

span.span: The default is 200.0 (a maximum zoom of 200%).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]包括滑块，可以用于调整级别。The default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a slider that can be used to adjust the level. 此属性指定滑块的上限值。This property specifies the upper-limit value for the slider. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性。The following example shows how to use this property. span.span: Arguments of the event.

summary.span: 只要未处理的 路由事件在其路由中到达此类，就会调用此方法。

span.span: Called whenever an unhandled routed event reaches this class in its route.

summary.span: 实现此方法可为此事件添加类处理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 继承中的中间类已经实现此方法的情况下，你仍应调用基实现。You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method. 此方法的目的是某种程度上类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 它提供了一种用而不是一个实例处理程序的类处理程序的派生类中对匹配事件进行处理。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下，匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case, the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为路由的事件可能遭到一个子元素，不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序，因此您的实现需要采用事件自变量的引发考虑源属性 （和不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下）。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event might have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will need to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 子类沿路由收到事件时，可以调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of could call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一个可能的方案是事件的自变量，以防出现故意将事件标记为已处理。One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取用户已在选定的文本。The following example shows how to get the text that a user has selected in the . value.span: 的不透明度。

value.span: 默认值为 0.4。

span.span: The default is 0.4.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你设置为 0，是透明的并且不可见。If you set the to 0, the is transparent and is not visible. 如果你设置为 1.0 或更高，不透明，所选文本是不可见。If you set the to 1.0 or greater, the is opaque and the selected text is not visible. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，设置属性粉红色，并设置属性为 0.7。The following example creates a , sets the property to pink, and sets the property to 0.7. summary.span: 获取或设置 的当前缩放级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the current zoom level for the .

value.span: 当前缩放级别，以百分比表示。

span.span: The current zoom level, interpreted as a percentage.

value.span: 默认值为 100.0（缩放级别为 100%）。

span.span: The default is 100.0 (a zoom level of 100%).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值约束的缩放级别和属性。The zoom level is constrained by the values of the and properties. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性。The following example shows how to use this property. span.span: Gets or sets the zoom increment.

value.span: 当前缩放增量，以百分比表示。

span.span: The current zoom increment, interpreted as a percentage.

value.span: 默认值为 10.0（缩放增量为 10%）。

span.span: The default is 10.0 (zoom increments by 10%).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缩放增量是依据百分比级别增加或减少时或执行命令，分别。The zoom increment is the percentage by which the level is increased or decreased when the or commands are executed, respectively. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性。The following example shows how to use this property.
